page.title: 15Cockernhoe Women's Institute
page.content: Cockernhoe Women's Institute started in 1953. There are fifteen members and they can join when they are eighteen years old. They meet on the first Tuesday of every month, usually in the Village Hall in Mangrove Rd.Their meetings include talks and demonstrations of cooking,dressmaking,flower arranging, collections of interesting things and travel.They plan and hold jumble sales and coffee mornings to raise money.Occasionally there are outings to the Gordon Craig Theatre in Stevenage, Mystery tours by coach and visits to public gardens. The ladies take it in turns to help with 'Meals on Wheels' which is taking a hot dinner to old people.In our village this happens three times a week and they deliver to two people.The meals are cooked in the
